title: Guacamole with Bacon
ingredients: ['4 ripe avocados, peeled, pitted and mashed', '4 rashers streaky bacon, cooked until crisp, drained and crumbled', '1 large tomato, seeded and finely chopped', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 dash hot pepper sauce to taste (optional)']
